title: Get the quota for a SKAN Dedicated Campaign per ad network

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The Application ID of the promoted app. You can get app_id by using the /app/list/ endpoint.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: ID of a SKAN Dedicated Campaign. Specify this field if you want to get ad group quota ( adgroup_quota_info ) for a certain campaign. Note : If the ID is not the ID of a SKAN Dedicated Campaign, an error will occur. To determine whether a Dedicated Campaign is a SKAN Dedicated Campaign, use /campaign/get/ and check whether the returned disable_skan_campaign is false .

parameters.name: adgroup_id
parameters.description: ID of an ad group within a SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign. Specify this field if you want to get ad quota ( ad_quota_info ) for a certain group. Note : If the ID is not the ID of an ad group within a SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign, the value of the returned ad_quota_info will be null.

parameters.name: has_advertiser_quota
parameters.description: Whether to return quota info via different advertiser IDs under the promoted app. Set it to true if you want to get campaign quota via different advertiser IDs. Default value: false .

examples.title: Query the Dedicated Campaign quota for an iOS app
Query the ad group quota within a Dedicated Campaign for an iOS app
Query the ad quota within a SKAN 4.0 ad group for an iOS app

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: split_test_quota
fields.description: Split test quota information.

fields.name: max_test_number
fields.description: Maximum test group number in one split-test. The value of this field will be 2 .

fields.name: available_test_group
fields.description: The number of split-test groups that you can launch now in this app.

fields.name: used_test_group
fields.description: The number of split-test groups that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_test_group
fields.description: The number of split-test groups that are to be released.

fields.name: used_quota
fields.description: The number of quota that has been launched.

fields.name: releasing_quota
fields.description: The number of quota that is to be released.

fields.name: campaign_quota_info
fields.description: Campaign quota.

fields.name: tiktok_campaign_quota_info
fields.description: Campaign quota under the TikTok network. The placements under TikTok network are PLACEMENT_TIKTOK and PLACEMENT_GLOBAL_APP_BUNDLE .

fields.name: total_campaign_quota_info
fields.description: Campaign quota under an app ID.

fields.name: total_campaign_quota
fields.description: The total quota of active Dedicated Campaigns. The value of this field will be 15 or 25 . Note : Expanding the quota of active Dedicated Campaigns to 25 per ad network for an iOS app is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: used_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: available_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that you can launch now.

fields.name: used_campaign_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: campaign_quota_by_adv
fields.description: Campaign quota under each advertiser ID.

fields.name: used_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: pangle_campaign_quota_info
fields.description: Campaign quota under the Pangle network. The placement available for Pangle network is PLACEMENT_PANGLE .

fields.name: total_campaign_quota_info
fields.description: Campaign quota under an app ID.

fields.name: total_campaign_quota
fields.description: The total quota of active Dedicated Campaigns. The value of this field will be 15 or 25 . Note : Expanding the quota of active Dedicated Campaigns to 25 per ad network for an iOS app is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: used_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: available_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that you can launch now.

fields.name: used_campaign_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_ids
fields.description: The IDs of Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: campaign_quota_by_adv
fields.description: Campaign quota under each advertiser ID.

fields.name: used_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that have been launched.

fields.name: releasing_campaign_quota
fields.description: The number of Dedicated Campaigns that are to be released.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: adgroup_quota_info
fields.description: Ad group quota under a Dedicated Campaign.

fields.name: total_adgroup_quota
fields.description: The quota of active ad groups. The value of this field will be 5 .

fields.name: used_adgroup_quota
fields.description: The number of ad groups that have been launched.

fields.name: available_adgroup_quota
fields.description: The number of ad groups that you can launch now.

fields.name: placements
fields.description: The allowed placements for ad groups. You cannot create ad groups with placements that are not listed here.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: Campaign ID.

fields.name: ad_quota_info
fields.description: Ad quota under an ad group within a SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign. Note : If the specified ad group ( adgroup_id ) is not within a SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign, the value of this field will be null. If you provide a SKAN 4.0 App ID ( app_id ) without specifying campaign_id and adgroup_id in the request, this field will represent the default ad quota for a regular SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign (a SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaign where Smart+ Campaign, Automated Creative Optimization, and Smart Creative settings are not enabled). Example: "ad_quota_info": {"available_ad_quota": 9, "total_ad_quota": 9,"adgroup_id": "0","used_ad_quota": 0} .

fields.name: total_ad_quota
fields.description: The quota of active ads. For ad groups within regular SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaigns (SKAN 4.0 Dedicated Campaigns where Smart+ Campaign, Automated Creative Optimization, and Smart Creative settings are not enabled), the value of this field will be 9 .

fields.name: used_ad_quota
fields.description: The number of ads that have been launched.

fields.name: available_ad_quota
fields.description: The number of ads that you can launch now.

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: Ad group ID.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
